On Tue, Apr 28, 2009 at 3:52 AM, Gaurav Pandey <gaurav_dell@...> wrote:
> 1. Is JUnit a unit testing tool? or is it a testing management tool in which we store test cases and test execution results

JUnit is a unit testing framework that does include a command-line
running tool.  However, most users run JUnit tests from an IDE, or a
build tool like ant.

> 2. I have download Junit from the http://www.junit.org/, however I have not been able to "load" the tool. I am not sure on which file to execute? I am running on Windows XP SP2.

Have you Googled for "running JUnit"?

   David Saff
